project_preview_description.text: The same great app, now built with different stacks!
Stacks: React with Hooks, React Router, axios, Ant Design UI Framework, Node.js, Express.js, PostgreSQL

project_description.text: The same great app, now built with different stacks!

After graduating from Lighthouse Labs I decided to keep myself updated and gain more experience with different backend stacks. The result is StartDuck2: Front-end updated with react hooks and back-end re-built with Node.js Express server.
Stacks: React with Hooks, React Router, axios, Ant Design UI Framework, Node.js, Express.js, PostgreSQL
